description: This rule detects suspicious processes with parent images located in the C:\Users\Public folder
name: Parent in Public Folder Suspicious Process
query: (process.parent.executable:C\:\\Users\\Public\\* AND process.command_line:(*powershell* OR *cmd.exe\ \/c\ * OR *cmd\ \/c\ * OR *wscript.exe* OR *cscript.exe* OR *bitsadmin* OR *certutil* OR *mshta.exe*))
author: Florian Roth
